about.summary: Functions used by other packages from Statistics Norway are gathered. General data manipulation functions, and functions for hierarchical computations are included (Langsrud, 2020) <doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.27313.61283>. The hierarchy specification functions are useful within statistical disclosure control.

Functions used by other packages from Statistics Norway are gathered. General data manipulation functions, and functions for hierarchical computations are included (Langsrud, 2020) <doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.27313.61283>. The hierarchy specification functions are useful within statistical disclosure control.

name: r-ssbtools
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.4.8' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ssbtools
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SSBtools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SSBtools/SSBtools_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 918ffd1fe9fabd0f1bb1c404bf9ea5e1c0aebab9058829999b5fdeb76b4ac798

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-matrix
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SSBtools')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SSBtools')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/statisticsnorway/SSBtools
  license: MIT
  summary: Functions used by other packages from Statistics Norway are gathered. General data
    manipulation functions, and functions for hierarchical computations are included
    (Langsrud, 2020) <doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.27313.61283>. The hierarchy specification
    functions are useful within statistical disclosure control.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - RJMW

# Package: SSBtools
# Type: Package
# Title: Statistics Norway's Miscellaneous Tools
# Version: 1.4.8
# Date: 2023-06-23
# Authors@R: c(person("yvind", "Langsrud", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "oyl@ssb.no"), person("Daniel", "Lupp", role = c("aut")), person("Bjrn-Helge", "Mevik", role = c("ctb")), person("Statistics Norway", role = "cph"))
# Depends: Matrix
# Imports: stringr, methods, MASS
# Description: Functions used by other packages from Statistics Norway are gathered. General data manipulation functions, and functions for hierarchical computations are included (Langsrud, 2020) <doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.27313.61283>. The hierarchy specification functions are useful within statistical disclosure control.
